css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-935e5322-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);padding-top:200px;padding-bottom:200px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-935e5322-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-1,255,255,255),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-935e5322-u{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-935e5322-u{padding-top:40px;padding-bottom:40px;}}
